Luevo.com

Luevo is a Toronto-based company that offers a unique take on letting consumers shop the runway. Inspired by crowdfunding, Luevo is letting people pre-order their favorite runway looks, which in turn gives up-and-coming designers the funds that they need to advance production.

Type of work:

Frontend Development

Coding of responsive HTML/CSS - Bootstrap/jQuery templates based on PSD designes provided by the client and integrating them with Ruby on Rails back-end code.

Technologies:
  • HTML5
  • CSS3
  • Bootstrap
  • JavaScript
  • jQuery
